item.title: Man can i like get help!
item.dc:creator: @TranScape TranScape
item.description:
@TranScape wrote:

ok well i have devolution

and smelting is fucking hard!

if u have like 2038 <-- number of furnace only one! of the furnaces that are number 2038 will work! omfg

is there any way i could make a

if(objectid=2038 and x cord that with using this

this is what it looks like

if ((UsedOnObjectID == 2391) || (UsedOnObjectID == 11661)) {
// furnace, range
if ( /* CheckForSkillUse2(ItemID, ItemSlot) == */true) {
skillX = UsedOnX;
skillY = UsedOnY;
checkCooking(ItemID);
}

i want it like this

if ((objectID == 2391) && (objectX == 2724) && (objectY == 3374)) {

i tried i got like 40 errors ffs…

wait well i tried again
k well i tried again did this

if ((objectID == 2781) && (objectX == 3226) && (objectY == 3255)) {
// furnace, range
if ( /* CheckForSkillUse2(ItemID, ItemSlot) == */true) {
skillX = UsedOnX;
skillY = UsedOnY;
checkCooking(ItemID);
}

got 2 errors…

number 1 is that
orphaned case
case 252:
^

2nd is

public String passHash(String password) {
^

illegal start of expression
